name: Smoothie Breakfast Bowl
description: Make your smoothie and eat it too. Perfect for those who like to eat instead of sip breakfast. This substantial breakfast bowl is sure to keep you full until lunch.

ingredients.name: Tutti Fruity Whole Food Topper or Cocoa Crunch Whole Food Sprinkle

preparation: In a blender, combine all ingredients except granola and nuts. Blend until smoothâ€”if you like it thicker, add ice cubes; for a thinner consistency, add water.
Transfer to a bowl. Top with granola, nuts and whole food sprinkle, if desired. Serve.
tips: Make dairy free: Replace Greek yogurt with 1 scoop (35 g) Power Up Vanilla Protein Blend and 1 cup water/ice.
